page.title: 19WORTHEN AND BROCKTON
page.content: This Domesday Project has dealt with the village of Worthen, but in practice this a joint community with the village of Brockton, there being no gap between the two communities. Because of the 12 km.square allocated for this particular survey the village of Brockton is not included, but it would give a false impression of this community if it was not said that all that applied to WORTHEN did also apply to Brockton. Amenities, services, and facilities are shared as though it was one village. Most of the services,etc are in the Worthen portion of the villages, but there is a South Shropshire District council estate of 45 dwellings in Brockton. The local doctor (Watson) who has his surgery as part of the village hall lives in Brockton.
